Navigation
Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Number/Remainder
Synopsis Remainder of two integer values.
Syntax Exp1 % Exp2
Types
Exp1 Exp2 Exp1 % Exp2
int int int
Description Yields the remainder when dividing the of Exp1 by the value of Exp2.
Examples 
rascal>12 % 5
int: 2
rascal>12 % 6
int: 0
Pitfalls Remainder is only defined on integers: 
rascal>13.5 % 6
Static Error: prompt:///:1,0: modulo not supported on real and int
Questions
Question 1.
The type of -17 % -8 is

Question 2. 
3 % -14 ==
